name: Final Hope (itch) (Riders-On-The-Storm)
description:
3D puzzle-platformer from the first person in high-tech style about saving the world with the help of intellectual abilities of the hero. On PC. 12+

See gamecraft descriptions and design document in attachments.

At this stage, some bugs may occur in the game, but we are working on it (you can tell us about the bugs in the comments).

Now the game is available in Russian for Windows. Download and enjoy!
